projects.name: CrossPlatformMidterm Project - Cross-Platform Mobile Application
projects.description: Developed a mobile application using Dart and the Flutter framework. Focused on creating a consistent user experience across different platforms.

projects.name: FinalSE Project - Data Analysis & Web Application
projects.description: Developed a complete system combining data analysis with a user-facing web interface. Utilized Python (Jupyter Notebook) for data processing, analysis, and model building. Integrated a T-SQL database for storage and querying. Built an interactive user interface with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to visualize data and analysis results.

projects.name: Lab7 Project - ASP.NET Core Web Application
projects.description: Built a dynamic, full-stack web application. Developed APIs and business logic using C# with the ASP.NET Core framework. Designed a responsive user interface using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Integrated and managed the application's database using T-SQL.

projects.name: Process1 Project - ASP.NET Web Application
projects.description: Developed a web application focused on server-side business logic processing. Built the core application logic using C# and the .NET Framework. Designed a functional user interface with HTML and CSS for user interaction.
